import Mathlib

open Polynomial Real Complex Matrix Filter Topology Multiset

abbrev putnam_1975_b4_solution : Prop := sorry
-- False

Let $C = \{(x, y) \in \mathbb{R}^2 : x^2 + y^2 = 1\}$ denote the unit circle. Does there exist $B \subseteq C$ for which $B$ is topologically closed and contains exactly one point from each pair of diametrically opposite points in $C$?
-/

(P : ℝ × ℝ → Prop)
(hP : P = fun (x, y) => x^2 + y^2 = 1)
: (∃ B ⊆ setOf P, IsClosed B ∧ ∀ x y : ℝ, P (x, y) → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ B) ((-x, -y) ∈ B)) ↔ putnam_1975_b4_solution :=

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_1975_b4
(P : ℝ × ℝ → Prop)
(hP : P = fun (x, y) => x^2 + y^2 = 1)
: (∃ B ⊆ setOf P, IsClosed B ∧ ∀ x y : ℝ, P (x, y) → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ B) ((-x, -y) ∈ B)) ↔ putnam_1975_b4_solution := by
  constructor
  · intro h
    simp_all [hP]
    <;> aesop
  · intro h
    simp_all [hP]
    <;> use ∅
    <;> simp
    <;> aesop

(P : ℝ × ℝ → Prop)

theorem putnam_1975_b4
(P : ℝ × ℝ → Prop)
(hP : P = fun (x, y) => x^2 + y^2 = 1)
: (∃ B ⊆ setOf P, IsClosed B ∧ ∀ x y : ℝ, P (x, y) → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ B) ((-x, -y) ∈ B)) ↔ putnam_1975_b4_solution := by
  have step1 : (∃ B ⊆ setOf P, IsClosed B ∧ ∀ x y : ℝ, P (x, y) → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ B) ((-x, -y) ∈ B)) ↔ putnam_1975_b4_solution := by
    constructor
    -- Forward direction
    intro h
    have h1 := h
    simp_all [hP, Set.subset_def, Xor', putnam_1975_b4_solution]
    <;> aesop
    -- Reverse direction
    intro h
    have h1 : putnam_1975_b4_solution := h
    have h2 : ∃ B ⊆ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1}, IsClosed B ∧ ∀ x y : ℝ, x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 = 1 → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ B) ((-x, -y) ∈ B) := by
      use {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1 ∧ p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0}
      have h3 : {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1 ∧ p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0} ⊆ {p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1} := by
        intro p hp
        simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
        <;> nlinarith
      have h4 : IsClosed ({p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1 ∧ p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0} : Set (ℝ × ℝ)) := by
        exact isClosed_le (continuous_fst.pow 2 |>.add (continuous_snd.pow 2)) continuous_const |>.inter (isClosed_le continuous_fst continuous_const) |>.inter (isClosed_le continuous_snd continuous_const)
      have h5 : ∀ x y : ℝ, x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 = 1 → Xor' ((x, y) ∈ ({p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1 ∧ p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0} : Set (ℝ × ℝ))) ((-x, -y) ∈ ({p : ℝ × ℝ | p.1 ^ 2 + p.2 ^ 2 = 1 ∧ p.1 ≥ 0 ∧ p.2 ≥ 0} : Set (ℝ × ℝ))) := by
        intro x y hxy
        simp only [Set.mem_setOf_eq, Set.mem_setOf_eq, Xor', Set.mem_setOf_eq] at hxy ⊢
        by_cases h₀ : x ≥ 0 <;> by_cases h₁ : y ≥ 0 <;> by_cases h₂ : (-x) ^ 2 + (-y) ^ 2 = 1 <;> by_cases h₃ : x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 = 1 <;>
          simp_all [sq, mul_assoc] <;>

            nlinarith
          }) <;>

          }) <;>
          (try {
            exact Or.inr ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith, by nlinarith⟩
          }) <;>
          aesop
      simp_all
      <;> aesop
    aesop
  exact step1
